meta.title: MyLLama — Ollama Chat Client
meta.description: A lightweight chat client for your own Ollama servers. Save conversations by room and keep control of your models.

hero.headline: Chat with your own Ollama servers.
hero.subheadline: Register your Ollama endpoint, talk to your models, and revisit conversations later — organized by chat room.

features.title: Bring your own Ollama URL
features.desc: Connect to the Ollama server you already run—local, remote, or on your LAN.

features.title: Chat rooms & history
features.desc: Conversations are saved by room so you can quickly review or continue where you left off.

features.title: Multiple endpoints
features.desc: Store more than one server address and switch anytime.

howSteps: Start a chat and choose your model on the server.
MyLLama saves your messages per chat room for later review.
sections.footerNote: MyLLama is an independent client app. Ollama and model availability depend on your server configuration.
